comment: She is now Professor Ralls but nonetheless a great professor! She is very clear about what she expects when grading. Class was always engaging and fun. She is not really a heavy lecturer, everything is more like a group discussion. Super nice! 10/10!

Mrs. Ralls (Murphy is her maiden name), is a very laid back and easy-going person. She delivers the course material well and does not make anything harder than it needs to be. Honors 1100 is generally an easy course, just make sure you stay on top of the assignments of which there are several.
Easy course with lots of class discussions, and she rarely calls on people who are not raising their hands. As long as she can see that you put in the effort, you'll be fine.
The Honors class in general is very simple. There are very little assignments, which are explained very thouroughly and allow a ton of time to complete. She is very understanding and kind.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: There are very few assignments and there aren't any exams so your main focus should be the content discussed in class. The assignments that we do have are clearly explained and have a decent amount of time to get them done.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things
